QuestData.Title: Render's Army
QuestData.Description: Heading up north, eh? How about you wage your own little war against those Blackrock monsters? What do you say, $n?$B$BKill any Blackrock orc that you see at Alther's Mill or Render's Camp. Kill until your skin turns red from their blood splatter and then come back to me and I'll pay you handsomely.$B$BIt might not stop the Blackrock invasion, but it'll be sure to put a kink in their plans.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill any 25 Blackrock Orcs in Alther's Mill or Render's Camp.
QuestData.RewardText: You've probably bought us another day, maybe two. Nice work, $n.

Objectives.Objective: Blackrock Orcs of Alther's Mill or Render's Camp slain
